name: TheComputerScientist
0:
”Alexa, open the computer scientist”
”ask the computer scientist”
”talk to the computer scientist”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the computer scientist
des: This skill will make you aware of many rare and lesser-known facts of the programming world which are not only unknown by most of the non-coders but may not also be known by the people of the programming community. It contains a set of enticing and amazing facts of the coding world which every coding geek should know! Not only this, but the skill may also help people prepare for coding interviews or quiz competitions by providing them with the facts which are "must know" for such events.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
